title: When A Chicken Goes To COSTCO
description:
What happens when the chicken crosses the road and ends up at the local COSTCO? Nikki and Mr. Malone are going to find out... 

Follow Mr. Malone on Twitter and Instagram

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
